Honestly after realizing it, I noticed
they really haven't changed anything in CSGO that's gameplay related. (What I mean is they haven't added any new weapons, or maps)
This game is more fun towards people who like comptieve games more than fun games which isn't bad it's just I don't like comptieve games. (since I suck at them lol)
Not only that it probably has my least favorite aspect of every game of every FPS mechanic ever.
•Slow Gameplay
•Camping
•Great amounts of Downtime
•And teamwork (sorta)
Oh well it's valve :P
